reference.title: Synology WRX560 Hardware Parts
reference.shortdesc: Knowing the different parts of your Synology WRX560 router's hardware is key to a proper set-up!

ul.li: Synology WRX560 Wi-Fi Router: Your Wi-Fi router, which gets attached to the modem with cables to facilitate an internet connection between the modem and your devices.
ISP Modem: A device that connects your home to your Internet Service Provider by translating the network signal into a format your devices can use.
AC Power Adapter: A device that converts AC (alternating current) into DC (direct current) from your wall outlet to provide the correct amount of power and voltage your router needs.
RJ-45 LAN Cable: A cable that connects your router to your wired devices (like computers) to facilitate a Wi-Fi connection.
